original_text:
Pay back into the laps of our neighbors seven times
    the contempt they have hurled at you, Lord.
korean_text: 주여 우리 이웃이 주를 비방한 그 비방을 그들의 품에 칠 배나 갚으소서

sentences.original_text: Pay back into the laps of our neighbors
seven times the contempt they have hurled at you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주님께 던진 멸시를 일곱 배로
